scripts.build: rm -rf src/background/build && rm -rf src/browser_action/build && webpack --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf src/background/build && rm -rf src/browser_action/build && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.zip: npm run build:prod && cp manifest.json manifest.dev.json && cp manifest.prod.json manifest.json && cd .. && zip -r paiyun-auto-apply.zip chrome-extension/src chrome-extension/icon128.png chrome-extension/manifest.json && mv paiyun-auto-apply.zip chrome-extension && cd chrome-extension && cp manifest.dev.json manifest.json && rm manifest.dev.json
